amendment.description: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to change the Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure rule with respect to certain farms.

vote.text: Amendment SA 801 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 801 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Pryor.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 801 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Pryor.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 801 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
